db:select.db:sql: select * from restaurant where name like :restaurantname LIMIT :mylimit OFFSET :myoffset
db:select.db:input-parameters: #[%dw 2.0 var pageSize = (vars.pageSize default 2) as Number var page = vars.page default 1 as Number --- { restaurantname: '%' ++ (vars.name default " " as String) ++ "%", mylimit: pageSize default 2 as Number, myoffset: (page -1)* (pageSize) as Number }]
